ch.nolix.nolixCommonLibrary.interfaces

Interface Configurable

  • All Superinterfaces:
    DeterminedSIMPLE_CLASS_NAMEd, Specifiable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Area, BorderableRectangle, Button, Container, Dialog, DialogContainer, Frame, Grid, HorizontalLine, HorizontalStack, InnerDialog, Label, MainFrame, MockDialog, Rectangle, SingleContainer, TabContainer, TextBox, TextLineRectangle, VerticalLine, VerticalStack

    public interface Configurable
extends Specifiable
    A configurable object is a specifiable object that probably has a name or class and that contains other configurable objects.
